entries.not_enough_mind: You do not have enough mind to do that.
entries.has_no_wounds: has no applicable wounds to heal.
entries.no_wounds: You have no applicable wounds to heal.
entries.not_that_attribute: You cannot heal wounds on that attribute.
entries.must_have_medikit: You must have a medikit in your inventory to perform this action.
entries.other_players_only: You must have a player targeted for you to be able to diagnose their wound and battle-fatigue levels.
